list.name: Iron Man
list.description: You know, it's moments like these when I realize what a superhero I am.

list.name: Spiderman
list.description: with great power comes great responsibility

list.name: Wolverine
list.description: Look, kid. You and I are gonna be good friends.

list.name: Captain America
list.description: The price of freedom is high. And it's a price I'm willing to pay.
